meanings.definition: The act of contaminating something again.
meanings.sent1: The recontaminations of the water source led to health concerns in the community.
meanings.sent2: After the cleanup, the recontaminations of the site were carefully monitored.
meanings.sent3: The recontaminations of the picnic food by ants made the guests laugh.
meanings.sent4: The recontaminations of negative thoughts kept creeping back into her mind.
meanings.sent5: The recontaminations of the virus in the hospital were a serious problem.

meanings.definition: Instances of a substance becoming contaminated again.
meanings.sent1: The lab study showed multiple recontaminations of the samples.
meanings.sent2: The recontaminations of the food packaging were unexpected.
meanings.sent3: The recontaminations of the experiment by the curious cat caused a delay.
meanings.sent4: The recontaminations of the river highlighted the need for stricter regulations.
meanings.sent5: The recontaminations of the soil affected the growth of the plants.
